definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: boil up, seethe, act proudly, presumptuously, rebelliously (NH Hiph. [[הזיד]]) as Heb.; Aram. of Zinjirli [[זד]] presumptuous, DHM:Sendsch. 56; Ar. za0da (med. y) increase, exceed, exaggerate, e.g. in talk; also Sab. n.pr, [[זיד]] (zaydun) DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 44 [[זידאל]] Id:ib. 52 (on distinct. betw. [[זוד]] and [[זיד]] in Sab. v. Sab. Denkm.:64); perh. also Sab. [[מזדודן]] great one, prince, e.g. Sat. Denkm.:89)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[זׇ֫דָה]] Je 50:29; 3 pl. [[זׇ֫דוּ]] Ex 18:11; —of Egyptians, [[בַּדָּבָר אֲשֶׁר זׇדוּ עֲלֵיהֶם]] Ex 18:11(E) in the matter as to which they acted presumptuously against them; of Babylon, [[זׇדָה]] ´[[אֶל־י]] Je 50:29 against ´[[י]] hath she acted presumptuously.
boil, seethe, trans., [[וַיׇּ֫זֶד יַעֲקׂב נׇזִיד]] Ge 25:29 and Jacob boiled pottage.

act presumptuously, insolently, Ex 21:14 (JE) [[כִּי יׇזִד אִישׁ עַל־רֵועהוּ לְגָרְגוֹ בְעָרְמָה]] when a man acteth presumptuously against his neighbour to slay him; usually against ´[[י]]; sq. vb. fin. De 1:43) and ye acted presumptuously and went up; sq. inf. De 18:20 the prophet Who shall presume to speak a word in my name; also abs. De 17:13 elsewh. only Ne; of Egyptians De 9:10 sq. [[עַל]] (=
